name: Game Maker (sagaksagak07)
description:
Hello.

You are invited to join us as game makers. This game you're playing right now has the map destroyed due to developer mistakes and various bugs.

I'd like to ask you, as a professional, to do a mission to restore the three island map.

You can have a variety of themed islands at your disposal.

You can collect resources from the island and get various materials or tools.

Restore the three islands with materials and tools.

Thank you for your help!

 

** target island

** resource island

** restoration process
